notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: This study has been approved by the Erasmus Medical Centre Ethics Committee (ref. no. MEC-2018-114). The study will be conducted according to the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki (10th version, Fortaleza 2013) and in concordance with the Dutch Medical Research Improving Human Subjects Act and other applicable guidelines, regulations, and acts. In compliance with the International Conference on Harmonisation Good Clinical Practice and other applicable regulations, patients will be informed and asked for written informed consent by their treating physician, local investigators, or research nurse at one of the participating hospitals.
